channel.title: docker on Home
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Home

item.title: Deploy Docker Registry with Dokku
item.description: Prerequisites You’ll need to prepare a bit. A local path on the server to store registry data. For example: /mydir/registry Docker installed on the client and server machine Dokku installed on the server For Authentication httpasswd command is installed For an External Registry Dokku letsencrypt plugin installed A working domain name pointing to the dokku app.

item.title: Fortunes on Slack
item.description: view the service homepage Introduction Have always enjoyed the UNIX fortunes program, ever since I was a wee newbie. If you aren’t familiar with it (sad), yes, its like a fortune cookie. It can be more technical in nature but not always.
